name: BCP_buffer
brief: Message buffer for BCP inter-process communication

algorithms.name:
Message Serialization: Pack/Unpack Buffer for IPC

BCP_buffer is the serialization mechanism for all BCP messages.
Each process uses a single buffer for both incoming and outgoing messages.

**Packable types:**
- POD types copyable via memcpy (int, double, etc.)
- Structs of POD types
- BCP_vec<T> of the above
- BCP_string
- Objects with pack(BCP_buffer&) method

**Buffer structure:**
- _data: Raw character array
- _size: Current message size
- _pos: Read position (incoming) or write position (outgoing)
- _max_size: Allocated capacity (grows as needed, never shrinks)
- _msgtag: Message type (for received messages)
- _sender: Sender process ID (for received messages)

**Usage pattern:**
- pack(): Append data to buffer, advances _size
- unpack(): Read data from buffer, advances _pos
- clear(): Reset for new message
